name: Amicote Eco
description: Amicote ECO is an organic and natural NPK fertilizer, of high quality and stability, which has a high content of organic matter, well composted and sanitized, without weed seeds and free of pathogens, toxic products and impurities. The organic matter of Amicote ECO is rich in humic substances and essential macronutrients such as Calcium, Potassium, Nitrogen and Phosphorus. Fertilizer used in organic farming. Amicote ECO guarantees the improvement of soil fertility and consequently good harvests.
